channel.title: Help me plox
channel.description: leeched from torvapkz where the f$$$$k do you edit the shops bc if u do ::shop 16 there is priam items i need to know where the shop is .... ;D

item.title: Help me plox
item.dc:creator: @jwags jwags
item.description:
@jwags wrote:

[quote=“grant16, post:1, topic:406221”]leeched from torvapkz
where the f$$$$k do you edit the shops bc if u do ::shop 16 there is priam items i need to know where the shop is …
;D[/quote]

ok ::shop 16 is a command not a shop, it simpy says when user types ::shop 16 give them these items, a shop is a bit more work
go to autospawn.cfg and copy one of the lines

should look like this

or something close, 741 is the npc id, 3221 is teh x coord and 3317 is the y coord, don’t worry about the others till you are experienced, if you are experienced you shouldn’t have this question. now go to shop.cfg file scroll all the way to the bottom and find what the last shop id was, the code should look something like this

[code]shop = 17 cookin_store 2 2 1379

100[/code]

the numbers mean this

[code]//-----ShopID—ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-

----Item----Amount–[/code]

get the shop id then go to client.java and search

you should see something like

else if (NPCID == 1917) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 31; }
where it says 31 put your shop id, then paste the code under one of the } brackets so it is its own code
there you go you have created a shop, edit the items in shop.cfg and there you go =)

your welcome mr. needing spoonfeeding

Read full topic
